This probably isn't the right thread to be asking this, but I'm not sure where else it should go.

But anyway, as we all know, Button Mash's Adventures is back on, with Hasbro's blessingâ€¦ More or less. So at the risk of looking like an enormous fool, I wanted to ask if that meant that Fighting Is Magic will also resume, as it was originally envisioned.
